intro.line1: Struggling to blur backgrounds for photos?
intro.paragraph1: You shouldn't have to wrestle with difficult tools for beautiful photos.
intro.paragraph2: Make Blur makes it effortless to blur backgrounds, blur images, and create stunning blur effects. Learn how to blur a photo, blur an image, or blur background on iPhone with our intuitive app.

features.title: Effortless Photo Editing That Actually Works

intro.line1: We understand how complicated photo editing can feel.
intro.paragraph1: That's why we've created an app that transforms you from a frustrated beginner into a confident photographer.
intro.paragraph2: No wrestling with difficult tools—just beautiful results.

items.title: Effortless Background Blur
items.description: Blur the background of your photos effortlessly with our auto-detect feature. Perfect for making your subject stand out and creating professional-looking images that shine on social media. Learn how to blur background on iPhone with just a few taps—no complicated editing required.

items.title: Simple Image Blur
items.description: Apply blur effects to entire images or specific areas without the frustration of complicated apps. Whether you want to blur pictures for artistic effect or privacy, Make Blur provides the tools you need. Discover how to blur an image quickly and effectively.

items.title: Custom Blur Drawing
items.description: Draw on your photos to create custom blur effects exactly where you want them. This unique feature gives you complete control without the complexity, allowing for creative and precise photo editing that makes you feel like a confident photographer.

items.title: How to Blur a Photo Made Simple
items.description: Make Blur is the perfect solution for anyone wondering how to blur a photo. Our intuitive interface eliminates frustration—learn how to blur photos on iPhone, blur a picture on iPhone, or blur a photo on iPhone with ease.

items.title: Professional Results, Simple Process
items.description: As a comprehensive blur tool, Make Blur offers everything you need without the complexity. From simple blur effects to advanced techniques, discover how to make a picture blurry with professional results that make you proud.

items.title: Users Love It
items.description: Specifically designed for iPhone users who want effortless photo editing. Make Blur is the best way to blur background on iPhone, with a 4.8-star rating for ease of use. Join thousands who've transformed from frustrated beginners to confident photographers.

items.title: Motion Blur
items.description: Create dynamic motion blur effects that add movement and energy to your photos.

items.title: Gaussian Blur
items.description: Apply smooth, natural gaussian blur for professional-looking soft focus effects.

items.title: Ghosting
items.description: Add ethereal ghosting effects that create mysterious and artistic photo transformations.

items.title: Pixelate
items.description: Use pixelate blur to create retro, digital art effects or protect privacy in your images.

items.title: Hexagonal
items.description: Apply unique hexagonal blur patterns for creative and modern photo effects.

items.title: Crystalize
items.description: Transform your photos with crystalize blur effects that add texture and visual interest.

intro.line1: Three simple steps to transform your photos from ordinary to stunning.
intro.paragraph1: No complicated tools, no frustration—just beautiful results.

steps.title: Download the App
steps.description: Download Make Blur from the App Store and get started in seconds. Join thousands of happy users who've discovered effortless photo editing.

steps.title: Open Your Photo
steps.description: Open any photo from your iPhone gallery and let the app auto-detect the background. No manual selection needed—it's that simple.

steps.title: Choose & Save
steps.description: Choose your favorite blur effect from motion blur, gaussian blur, ghosting, pixelate, hexagonal, or crystalize. Save your masterpiece and feel proud of your beautifully edited photos.

final_cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Photos?
final_cta.paragraph1: If you want stunning photos that shine on social media, downloading our app is the perfect next step.
final_cta.paragraph2: Enjoy a seamless photo editing experience with perfect backgrounds—no more frustration with complicated apps.
final_cta.paragraph3:
Don't miss out on creating stunning, professional-looking photos.
Transform from frustrated beginner to confident photographer today.
